title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Gather, document, and analyze requirements from stakeholders for the LanguageLynxIa system.

title: Design the Overall System Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the LanguageLynxIa system, including AI and machine learning components.

title: Define the API Endpoints and Interfaces
description: Specify RESTful API endpoints and define interfaces for communication between components.

title: Develop the Machine Learning Models
description: Train and develop machine learning models for translation tasks.

title: Implement the Frontend User Interface
description: Create an intuitive and user-friendly interface for inputting and viewing translations.

title: Integrate and Test the Machine Learning Models
description: Test the machine learning models in a realistic system environment.

title: Perform Security Audits and Optimizations
description: Conduct security audits to ensure data privacy and prevent potential threats.
dependencies: Integrate and Test the Machine Learning Models

title: Deploy and Monitor the LanguageLynxIa System
description: Launch the LanguageLynxIa system, monitor its performance, and address any issues.
dependencies: Integrate and Test the Machine Learning Models
